about_the_game:
In the age of the "gods," the continuation of life is an extravagant hope. We do not want to be food, do not want to live forever in the shadows. This will be a war to end slavery, and from this moment on, we will not bow our heads, we will not bow our knees, we will not be the dust of history. We are masters of our own fate.

Ever-changing skill sets, each game is a new challenge!

Experience the thrill of a rich and varied skill set in intra-office combat, and each game is a unique adventure. Through clever skill combinations, you will face a steady stream of enemies and enjoy the experience of cutting grass.

Take on epic bosses and feel the thrill of extreme operation!

Each Boss has a unique skill and fighting style that presents the player with great strategic and operational challenges. Through subtle tactics and precise operations, defeat these powerful bosses and prove your strength.

Build your ultimate gear for endless power!

Gain equipment in battle and create your best suit with a unique compositing system. The infinite combination of various equipment affixes allows you to constantly pursue the perfect equipment that suits you best, enhance your combat effectiveness, and enjoy the ultimate brushing experience.

The optimal technology upgrade strategy to achieve the optimal solution of the growth path!

Choose different upgrade directions according to your preferences and strategies. Each upgrade will bring new challenges and strategies to help you gain an edge in the battle. Unlock various skills and abilities in the tech tree to make your character progressively more powerful.

Team message

Hello, dear players! We are Electronic Singularity, an independent game team made up of gamers from all over the world. In the team, there are loyal producers of brush treasure game guides, hardcore action game masters, meat pigeon game encyclopedia, senior fans of Eastern culture, science fiction writers... And all of this comes from our love for games.

Zerium War: Destiny is our first game, and we want to take a solid step toward spreading the love of gaming to more people. With the greatest enthusiasm and humility, we look forward to the criticism and suggestions of the players, and we will collect and organize all the opinions, and the most authentic voice from the players into the game.

Finally, please add our game to the wish list!! We look forward to seeing you even if we have to travel through the singularity!

name: 谪金之战：命运（Zerium War: Destiny）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel 7th gen i5 or AMD Ryzen 1700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 1050 GTX,or faster
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit or better
  • Processor: Intel 10th gen i7 or AMD Ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 2060 GTX,or faster
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Battle through waves of invaders in Zerium War: Destiny, a sci-fi Roguelite RPG. As Earth's core guardian, wield auto-shooting skills to grow stronger. Face random challenges and gear up for each victory.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Thai, Portuguese - Portugal, Vietnamese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
